Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory833.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "While some problems have been taken care of, I can't seem to shake the feeling that there is more down the road...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Sigh. Looks like we won't be leaving these mines anytime soon.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Pfft. Hahaha, I never thought I'd see this side of you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "You're right. As the commandant of an elite squad, this kind of small incident must be just another day at the office for you.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'The mine tunnel lies shrouded in darkness, with only the faint glow of their handheld lamps piercing through the gloom.'}
{3: 'While Lucia investigates the mysterious signal that suddenly appeared, Bridget and you are tasked with finding a path to rendezvous with the survey team and Engineering Force.'}

{3: "The underground complex is a maze of interconnected passages. Having bypassed security measures using An Jie's authentication chips, you're now starting to see the true colors of the tower buried deep beneath."}
{3: 'With each authentication granted, more hidden passages and laboratories emerge from obscurity.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory937.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'These people... they really know how to keep their secrets buried deep.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Bet they've grown used to living like this.", 3: '26'}
{3: 'Living in darkness becomes second nature—they grow to shun the sunlight, digging ever deeper into the earth for new sanctuaries.'}
{3: 'Besides... the things they do here could never see the light of day.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Another one of these... diaries.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget uses her weapon to pick up a tattered notebook from the ground. After carefully putting on gloves, she begins to examine its pages with caution.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'More of the same... contents.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory925.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory925.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '4', 5: '1'}
{1: 'The mine collapsed again today.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'We really have the rescue team to thank... Konstantin Mining may be heartless, but they always make sure to call for rescuers when this happens.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: "At least... at least it's better than how things are at other places. At least we can scrape by here.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: "In a place like this, we can't ask for much more.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'Only two boys got hurt, trying to be heroes by going too far in. Everyone else is fine... Cough.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: '...', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: '—Miner A', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory938.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory938.jpg'}
{1: "The rescue workers saved me again. I just... Sigh. I'm so grateful to both of them.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'I heard that before all this happened, the couple used to be extreme sports enthusiasts—off-road racing, rock climbing, stuff like that...', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: "Sigh. I would have still been a code monkey typing away at my computer if it weren't for this damn virus outbreak.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: "Who would've thought I'd actually come down here to mine...", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: '...', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: '—Miner A', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory924.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory924.jpg'}
{1: 'Time down here in the mine was unbearable without my diary.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: "I'm waiting for rescue, but something feels off this time. I heard... I heard some strange noises...", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'I played dead, keeping my eyes shut tight and refusing to look at anything. I only opened my eyes and wrote down all this when the strange noises were gone.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'Nothing bad is gonna happen to me if I just keep my eyes and ears shut... right?', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: '—Miner A', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 6: '1', 8: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '4'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgUi/BgNewCommon.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgUi/BgNewCommon.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory937.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory937.png'}
{3: 'The rest of the diary is blank.'}
{2: '...', 3: '81', 4: 'Pretty sure the guy ended up getting rescued.', 5: '79'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Yup, pretty sure that's the case.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "The two rescue workers mentioned in this diary... they've got to be my parents.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "They once told me that they were extreme sports guides and that they'd venture through the desolate wilderness and treacherous peaks before the Punishing outbreak.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "They once promised me that they'd take me to all these beautiful places once the Punishing was gone...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you alright?', 3: '88', 4: "You'll see it for yourself. I'm sure of it.", 5: '91'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Oops, don't worry. Got a little carried away back there thinking about my parents.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'll make sure to travel to all these places they've been to and see what they've seen when all this is over, though.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Yup, that's right. I'll make sure to travel to all these places they've been to and see what they've seen when all this is over.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Care to join me when I'm ready to do that?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Then it's a deal! Mind you, though, that it isn't going to be easy, and no, I don't want to hear you complain.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Haha, just kidding.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Oh, there's something here...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '4', 5: '1'}
{3: 'As the searchlight sweeps across another darkened control panel, Bridget places her access card against it. After a moment, the long-dormant panel slowly flickers to life.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "I mean... who's been maintaining the power system this entire time?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Though everything appears shrouded in a veil of decay, it seems that with the right key, the world behind these stone walls has slowly begun to show itself.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory936.png'}
{3: 'With the access card verified, the laboratory lights automatically activate. Harsh white light floods down instantly, almost blindingly bright.'}
{3: 'A soft creaking sound echoes through the room.'}
{3: 'Above, a security camera with a blinking red light slowly pivots.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: '...Is this a monitoring room?', 4: '1'}
{3: "This monitoring room isn't on the map, and this is when it hits you that something is off."}
{3: "Without a moment's hesitation, Bridget raises her gun and takes a precise shot at the security camera."}
{2: "There's another one—", 3: '127'}
{2: '(Raise your gun and shoot)', 3: '128'}
{3: 'The surveillance camera comes crashing to the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Could someone be controlling these from the monitoring room that wasn't on the map?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget crouches down to examine the shattered security camera more closely.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "...It's a motion-sensing camera. It probably only turned toward us when it detected our presence.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'We need to exercise caution all the same, though.', 3: '139'}
{3: 'This unexpected incident has heightened the tension in the air.'}
{3: "Having copied the research records from the terminal's control panel, the two of you quickly make your exit from the laboratory."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory924.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'It feels much safer out here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Though the mine tunnel is darker, its narrow confines somehow feel more secure than the stark, exposed laboratory with its harsh white lights.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Nice reflexes back there, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'This is no ordinary feat for a human. Good job, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Task Force really is full of talented people...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Given what you're capable of, you should have no trouble joining Task Force.", 3: '156'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Well, they've been telling me to apply for Task Force since we finished boot camp.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "But... I've always felt like I don't belong there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Task Force is great. Fighting on the frontlines with the best frames available and everything, but... if everyone joins Task Force, who's gonna be there to support them?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Ah, I'm not saying Task Force is bad or anything, it's just...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Someone has to be there to help them, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Everyone has their own path to follow, and I...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'My path has never been with Task Force.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff', 3: "Are you sure you don't want to join Task Force? The conditions there are better than in Support Force.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Staff', 3: "Your training data qualifies you for Task Force... Are you sure you're not gonna sleep on it some more?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Nope, and I'm sure about that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I choose Support Force.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: "Woah, what are you even doing here when you're doing so well?!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Support Force Member A', 3: "I mean, why aren't you in Task Force?! They're always the first ones to get new research results and frames...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "This place is great, too! We get to operate heavy vehicles here! Task Force doesn't have nearly as many vehicles for everyone to drive...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory924.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Haha, the old timer would always tell me that I'd flushed my talent down the toilet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I've never been fond of making choices, but never have I regretted joining Support Force.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '4'}
{3: 'The scenes within her M.I.N.D. shatter into pieces, then slowly reconstruct themselves.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4501_05.jpg'}
{3: 'If she had truly weighed her options back then, the young girl she was should have accepted compensation from Norman Mining Corp and lived out her days in some conservation area.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4501_05.jpg'}
{3: 'If she had made a calculated choice after becoming a Construct, she should have joined Task Force, earned more merits, risen to an elite squad, and gained more authority.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 4: '4', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4501_05.jpg'}
{3: 'She has faced countless opportunities, yet she has never strayed from the path she set out to take.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory924.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Not to toot my own horn, but I have indeed led Support Force to assist more Task Force operations and conservation areas than ever before.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The numbers don't lie. Since Bridget joined Support Force, numerous squads that would have otherwise died have made it back to Babylonia safely, thanks to her timely assistance and dedication."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I always thought I was giving it my all, but... Sigh.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lets out a deep, heavy sigh.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Trojan... I never noticed anything wrong with her. And I've been thinking... that maybe I'd have been able to help her had I been more attentive.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Based on Bridget's description of Trojan, she was likely a spy working for Kurono until her M.I.N.D. was damaged, causing her memory loss."}
{3: "But with Trojan being who she was, God only knows how she perceived Bridget's kindness when Bridget tried to be kind to her..."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "...You're right, she might think I'm just there to spy on her.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'She... is being very contradicting. She truly did help Ruolin and me back then, and there is no way Ruolin and I would have improved as fast as we did without her guidance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "For someone who was supposed to be a spy, it's weird how she's trying to draw all this attention to herself...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Maybe... those times were precious to her, too.', 3: '220'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Haha, I wouldn't be so sure about that. l mean, Ruolin and I were quite a handful...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'But... it worked out fine in the end.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A familiar smile graces her face.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Trojan is still alive, and so am I. Some wrongs... can still be righted.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a smile and a shrug, Bridget walks forward.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Come on, we've got a long road ahead of us.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory927.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory927.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory927.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Suppressed, painful gasps echo softly through the sealed room.'}
{3: 'Heavy footsteps, bestial growls, and chaotic sounds of scraping metal fill the air.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Ahem... It seems like we have... new guests.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory927.jpg'}

{3: "Dim lights slowly flicker to life in the dark room. Across the dense array of surveillance screens at the control panel, there appears the face of a brown-haired Construct that's calmly shattering the monitors one by one."}
{2: '???', 3: "Ahem... Well... guess I've got to ready myself to receive our guests, then..."}
